mods.abstract: Mulatto-Girl in Jail. WAS committed into the Prison of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 27th, April instant, a mulatto-girl, calling herself LUCINDA, and saying she belongs to P.J. Pavy, residing on Bayour Courtableau, in the Parish of St. Landry
